languages.text: "Хотел бы я знать, что это все значит. Наша планета правда атакована? Или кто-то излишне предприимчивый прислал сюда этих клеветников, чтобы подорвать силу династии фон Валанциус? Кто бы это мог быть..."

"I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."
languages.original_text: "Хотел бы я знать, что это все значит. Наша планета правда атакована? Или кто-то излишне предприимчивый прислал сюда этих клеветников, чтобы подорвать силу династии фон Валанциус? Кто бы это мог быть..."

traits.locale_text: "I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some overly crafty individual send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be..."

"I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some overly crafty individual send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be..."

"I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

"I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

"I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

languages.text: 「一体どういうことでしょう。本当に我々の惑星が襲撃を受けたのでしょうか？それとも、狡猾な日和見主義の者がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の力を弱めるために、この中傷者たちをここに送り込んだのでしょうか？だとしたら、一体誰なのか…」
languages.original_text: "I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

traits.locale_text: 「一体どういうことでしょう。本当に我々の惑星が襲撃を受けたのでしょうか？それとも、狡猾な日和見主義の者がフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の力を弱めるために、この中傷者たちをここに送り込んだのでしょうか？だとしたら、一体誰なのか…」

languages.text: “我想知道这究竟是怎么回事。是我们的行星真的遭到了攻击，还是某个狡猾的投机者在幕后指使这些人，妄图破坏冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的权威？会是谁呢，我在想……”
languages.original_text: "I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

traits.locale_text: “我想知道这究竟是怎么回事。是我们的行星真的遭到了攻击，还是某个狡猾的投机者在幕后指使这些人，妄图破坏冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的权威？会是谁呢，我在想……”

languages.text: «A saber a qué viene todo esto. ¿De verdad está en peligro nuestro planeta? ¿Y si un oportunista ha mandado a estos malhechores para echar por tierra el poder de la dinastía von Valancius? ¿Quién podría ser el responsable?...».
languages.original_text: "I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

traits.locale_text: «A saber a qué viene todo esto. ¿De verdad está en peligro nuestro planeta? ¿Y si un oportunista ha mandado a estos malhechores para echar por tierra el poder de la dinastía von Valancius? ¿Quién podría ser el responsable?...».

languages.text: « Je me demande ce qu'il se passe exactement. Notre planète est-elle vraiment attaquée ? Ou un opportuniste sournois aurait-il envoyé des diffamateurs pour nuire à l'image de la dynastie von Valancius ? Qui pourrait avoir fait ça... »
languages.original_text: "I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

traits.locale_text: « Je me demande ce qu'il se passe exactement. Notre planète est-elle vraiment attaquée ? Ou un opportuniste sournois aurait-il envoyé des diffamateurs pour nuire à l'image de la dynastie von Valancius ? Qui pourrait avoir fait ça... »

languages.text: "Ich frage mich, worum es bei der ganzen Sache geht. Wird unser Planet wirklich angegriffen? Oder hat irgendein heimtückischer Opportunist diese Verleumder hergeschickt, um die Macht der Dynastie von Valancius zu unterminieren? Wer könnte das wohl sein ...?"
languages.original_text: "I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich frage mich, worum es bei der ganzen Sache geht. Wird unser Planet wirklich angegriffen? Oder hat irgendein heimtückischer Opportunist diese Verleumder hergeschickt, um die Macht der Dynastie von Valancius zu unterminieren? Wer könnte das wohl sein ...?"

languages.text: "Bunun anlamı ne acaba? Gezegenimiz sahiden saldırı altında mı? Yoksa sinsi fırsatçının teki bu iftiracıları yollayıp von Valancius hanedanlığının gücüne gölge düşürmeye mi çabalıyor? Kim yapar ki bunu?"
languages.original_text: "I wonder what all this is about. Is our planet really under attack? Or did some devious opportunist send these slanderers here to undermine the might of the von Valancius dynasty? Who could it be, I wonder..."

traits.locale_text: "Acaba bu ne anlama geliyor? Gezegenimiz gerçekten saldırıya mı uğradı? Yoksa sinsi fırsatçının teki bu iftiracıları yollayıp von Valancius hanedanlığının gücüne gölge düşürmeye mi çalışıyor? Kim olabilir acaba?"
